sn35.112:4.1: “Mendicants, without directly knowing and completely understanding sights …
sn35.112:4.6: phenomena, without dispassion for them and giving them up, you can’t end suffering.
sn35.112:4.7: By directly knowing and completely understanding sights …
sn35.112:4.12: phenomena, having dispassion for them and giving them up, you can end suffering.”
